label: Counter-based
approach: Attach a .then() to each promise, filling a results array by index. A counter tracks how many have resolved — when it hits zero, resolve the outer promise with the full array.
steps: Handle the empty array edge case — resolve immediately with [].
Create a results array of the same length and a remaining counter.
For each promise, attach .then() that stores the value at the correct index and decrements remaining.
When remaining hits 0, resolve the outer promise with the results array.
Attach .catch() (via reject) so the first rejection immediately rejects the outer promise.
